formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'BASE64_DECODE' =-
[Syntax] BASE64_DECODE(<base64_string>)
[Synopsis] Decode a base64 string
[Description] Returns the plain text string
